body: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

body: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
author: William Butler Yeats

body: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

body: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
author: Alan Kay

body: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

body: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: Buddha

body: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: Steve Jobs

body: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

body: If you can dream it, you can do it.
author: Walt Disney

body: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

body: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
author: George Addair

body: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
author: Albert Schweitzer

body: The harder I work, the luckier I get.
author: Samuel Goldwyn

body: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

body: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
author: Chris Grosser

body: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

body: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

body: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: John D. Rockefeller

body: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
author: Thomas Jefferson

body: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

body: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela

body: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
author: Aristotle

body: The best revenge is massive success.
author: Frank Sinatra

body: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
author: Lao Tzu

body: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
author: Ralph Marston

body: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

body: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

body: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

body: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

body: Try not to become a man of success, but rather try to become a man of value.
author: Albert Einstein

body: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

body: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

body: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
